text: The French Second Republic was a short-lived republican government of France under President Louis-Napol√©on Bonaparte. It lasted from the 1848 Revolution to the 1851 coup by which the president made himself Emperor Napoleon III and started the Second Empire. ==References== French Republic 2 Category:1840s establishments in France Category:1848 establishments in Europe Category:1850s disestablishments in Europe Category:Disestablishments in France Category:1852 Category:1840s in Europe Category:1850s in France Category:States and territories established in the 19th century Category:States and territories disestablished in the 19th century
title: French Second Republic
